trends: There has been one other sighting in Augusta
There were no other sightings in Augusta on or around April 3rd 2011
Summary: taking a walk at midnight with a friend
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking a walk at midnight with a friend, when i noticed a yellow object,moving in multiple directions, making manuevers that no present aircraft or satellite could do. After My friend went back inside,i decided to look further into this, it was then i discovered there was not just one, but about 20-25 of these. One of the larger ones was yellow and the other one was blue, and each had what looked like its own fleet,that is,if color is an indication of their races,several sped up and i saw a flash of light as they moved,and then they disappeared,this was the smaller ones, the two main ones didn't move much,i never believed in aliens until last night.
